name: team.billableInfo
desc: Gets billable users information for the current team.

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by previous call, to indicate from where you want to list next page of users list. Default value fetches the first page.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return.

team_id.desc: encoded team id to get the billable information from, required if org token is used.

user.desc: A user to retrieve the billable information for. Defaults to all users.

errors.fatal_error: The server could not complete your operation(s) without encountering a catastrophic error.
errors.invalid_cursor: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.
errors.user_not_found: Unable to find the requested user.
